Module: upload text

Some words here

Presentation server-function for upload-text module

  • upload_text_sb_server

Presentation UI-elements for upload-text module

  • upload_text_sb_main
  • upload_text_sb_side

Example: fundamental functions

To design your own shinypods, it may be useful to consider the structure of these functions

Server function for upload-text Shiny module

  • upload_text_server

Creates the UI elements for upload-text Shiny module

  • upload_text_ui

Utilities - reactive

Some functions that make it a little easier to program with reactives

Evaluates the validity of a reactive expression

  • isValidy

Validates Shiny-module input, returns reactive

  • reactive_validate

Utilities - HTML

These functions help you to make HTML fragments to use with the shiny::renderUI() function.

Creates HTML container for scrollable pre-formatted text

  • pre_scroll
  • pre_scroll_vert

Converts text into an HTML fragment

  • text_html

Converts dataframe into an HTML fragment

  • tibble_html

Utilities - composing shinypods

These functions are used to contsruct shinypods. You will likely not need them to use shinypods.

Constructs sp_srv object: template for server-return

  • sp_srv

Constructs sp_ui object: template for UI elements

  • sp_ui

Utilities - miscellaneous

Runs (or lists) example shiny apps

  • sp_shiny_example
